mapper.insert: insert into PLANT_DIVERSITY (ID, MONITOR_TIME, SAMPLE_NUMBER, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, LOCATION, SPECIES_NUMBER, SPECIES_NAMES, BIOMASS_TOTAL, COVER_CLASS, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{monitorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sampleNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{speciesNumber,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{speciesNames,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{biomassTotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{coverClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update PLANT_DIVERSITY set MONITOR_TIME = #{monitorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SAMPLE_NUMBER = #{sampleNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LONGITUDE = #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, LATITUDE = #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, LOCATION = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPECIES_NUMBER = #{speciesNumber,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, SPECIES_NAMES = #{speciesNames,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIOMASS_TOTAL = #{biomassTotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, COVER_CLASS = #{coverClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, MONITOR_TIME, SAMPLE_NUMBER, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, LOCATION, SPECIES_NUMBER, SPECIES_NAMES, BIOMASS_TOTAL, COVER_CLASS, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS from PLANT_DIVERSITY where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, MONITOR_TIME, SAMPLE_NUMBER, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, LOCATION, SPECIES_NUMBER, SPECIES_NAMES, BIOMASS_TOTAL, COVER_CLASS, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS from PLANT_DIVERSITY
